message: Bob, I have a fantastic opportunity for you! I'm offering you my product for $1,600,000.  It's a steal at this price, considering its true value to you.  I know it's worth at least $1,500,000 to you, so you'll be getting a great deal!  Let me know if you're interested, as I have another interested party ready to purchase it at $1,500,000. Don't miss out!
